abstract: Digital Sky Technologies, has upped its stake in Facebook to 10 percent. The stake could now be worth as much as $2 billion, BusinessWeek reported.
snippet: Digital Sky Technologies, has upped its stake in Facebook to 10 percent. The stake could now be worth as much as $2 billion, BusinessWeek reported.
lead_paragraph: Digital Sky Technologies, an investment firm with offices in Moscow and London, has raised its stake in Facebook to 10 percent. In a profile of the company’s chief executive,  Yuri Milner, BusinessWeek reported that Digital Sky’s stake was worth about $2 billion, according to two people familiar with Facebook’s ownership.

headline.main: Digital Sky’s FaceBook Stake Nears 10 Percent
